title: Etoiles 4: Jeunes Francophones
creator_credit: BBC-TV, Susan Paton and Luis Espana
brief_description: Filmed in Toulouse (France), Montreal (Canada) and Dakar (Senegal), the programmes focus on the variety of the French-speaking world. It focuses on aspects of life and concerns common to teenagers all around the world. Colourful and set to a heady rap theme, ‘Jeunes Francophones’ is filmed in magazine style and presented by three teen reporters, Isabelle, Cecile and Boss M.C. The series comprises 10 episodes of 19 minutes and is intended to be used by Years 10 and 11 students. The episode titles describe the theme of each episode: ‘Trois Continents’, ‘Le Look’, ‘Le Sport’, ‘Temps Libre’, ‘Notre environement’, ‘Le travail’, ‘Les medias’, ‘Je t’aime’, ‘La bonne assiette’, ‘Notre planete’. Includes a study guide with full transcripts and activities.
